response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which holds significant value for you at $12,000. We're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500, capturing the essence of its quality and benefits while ensuring you receive a substantial discount. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering the high demand and limited availability of this product. We believe this price reflects both the value we place on our product and the value you see in it. Let's make this deal happen!", "product_price": 9500}
